page.shortlink: api desktop api a5 object toolbar enum function
page.description: The A5.TOOLBAR_ENUM() method returns a CR-LF delimited list of all toolbars in the current database.
page.prototype: Toolbar_List as C = A5.Toolbar_Enum(C lastname|N object_enum_flags)

argument.name: object_enum_flags
argument.description: Optional. NULL (Default), 1 = Full paths and filenames of the sets.
